entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
